metadata.dc:author: Camarasa, J G
Garc√≠a Flores, A
metadata.dc:description: A case of keratodermia palmoplantaris progrediens et transgrediens is described. The genetic and clinical data confirms the diagnostic of "mal de Meleda". This peculiar disease is very uncommon in our clinics.
metadata.dc:title: Keratosis palmoplantaris progrediens recesiva (mal de Meleda).
[Recessive keratosis palmoplantaris progrediens (Meleda's disease)].
